entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Grand Manan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:51 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grand Manan 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
